When creating a new Payment Template, the uniquness identifier is based on the combination of the Alias + CreditorAccountNumber The Alias field is the name of the template.
Error Conditions (responseState.ErrorCode): 70=Technical error 385=Invalid debit account 6484=No agreement can be found for this user 6508=Duplicate creditor account for predefined creditor (Create, update) 6000=Validation error (Create, update)[When this ErrorCode is received, you need to check responseState.errorItem for the specific error items, shown below]
Validation Errors (responseState.errorItem): 6401=Invalid creditor agent identification (Creditor agent) 6402=Invalid creditor account number (Creditor account) 6403=Invalid creditor account number length (Creditor account) 6405=Creditor agent country not open for trade 6406=Invalid creditor country code (Creditor) 6417=Invalid creditor agent BIC identification (Creditor Agent) 6428=Account number missing (Creditor account) 6431=A creditor with this supplier number already exists (Supplier number) 6435=Predefined creditor is not found (Update, Delete, Read) 6437=Invalid ultimate creditor country code (Ultimate creditor) 6445=Invalid format of OCR (OCR) 6458=Invalid identification for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary agent) 6459=Invalid BIC identification for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary Agent) 6467=Mismatch between country for intermediary agent 1 and BIC 6473=Creditor agent identification is missing (Creditor Agent) 6481=Identification for intermediary agent 1 is missing (Intermediary agent) 6486=Invalid country for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary Agent) 6490=Transfer currency is not valid 6491=Invalid creditor agent country 6498=No OCR agreement found (OCR) 6509=Not authorized for predefined creditor id (Update, Delete) 6510=Not authorized. Agreement not found (Create) 6512=Bank details not found for IBAN (CreditorAgent) 6513=Creditor agent BIC is required (CreditorAgent) 6515=Creditor agent national id is required (CreditorAgent) 6516=Creditor agent national id is mandatory when creditor account is BBAN (CreditorAgent) 6648=Predefined creditor validation failed 6853=Charge bearer is not allowed 6884=Bank is not configured for payment template feature</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v2_1"/> <xs:import <xs:enumeration value="DEBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CRED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SHAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>In a credit transfer context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the debtor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the creditor. In a direct debit context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SLEV"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges are to be applied following the rules agreed in the service level and/or scheme.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeInfoTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TOTP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Total amount in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TOTA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Total amount in account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DNBP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product charge specified in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DNBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product charge specified in the transfer currency deducted from the transfer amount. Pertains only to outgoing payments where charges on the sender side are to be borne by the beneficiary.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OURP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges on the beneficiary side to be borne by the sender in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OURA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges on the beneficiary side to be borne by the sender in account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PRO1"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postCode" type="cm:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to text."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ADDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the complete postal address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PBOX"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is a postal office (PO) box.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOME"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the home address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BIZZ"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the business address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MLTO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which mail is sent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DLVY"> IBAN or other generic identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="cm:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification of the currency in which the account is held.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Amount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="cm:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="cm:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Balance"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="cm:Balance_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="cm:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmountOptionalCurrency"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="cm:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="cm:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAmounts"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains information regarding debit and credit amount along with counter values and conversionRate info.
